survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee engagement levels and identify factors influencing retention within the organization. The insights will help improve workplace satisfaction and reduce turnover.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current role in the company?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for better measurement of satisfaction levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button, single choice.

questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse priorities.
